label: Username
desc: The name of the user, as they’ve defined it.

label: Location
desc: The user-defined location for this account’s profile.

label: Bio
desc: The user-defined UTF-8 string describing their account.

label: Creation Date
desc: Time and date, when the account was created.

label: Followers
desc: The number of followers an account currently has.

label: Friends
desc: The number of friends an account currently has.

label: Favourites
desc: The number of favourites an account currently has.

label: Verified
desc: When true, indicates that the user has a verified account

label: Tweet Date
desc: UTC time and date when the Tweet was created

label: Tweet Text
desc: The actual UTF-8 text of the Tweet

label: Hashtags
desc: All the other hashtags posted in the tweet along with #covidvaccine

label: Source
desc: Utility used to post the Tweet, Tweets from the Twitter website have a source value - web

label: Retweeted
desc: Indicates whether this Tweet has been Retweeted by the authenticating user.
